Name: Awol
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the following order. Then FLAME drink and allow to burn for no more than ten seconds before extinguishing flame and consuming. Take extreme care and beware of hot glass.
Review: A strong but surprisingly palatable shot.
History: Created in 1993 by Lane Zellman at Louis XVI Restaurant, St. Louis Hotel, New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Awol contains 108 calories
